message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this product which I believe will be very valuable to you. I'm asking for $14,000. I think this is a fair price considering the benefits it will bring.
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $12,000. I believe that's a fair price considering the market value of the product.
Bob, I understand your perspective on the market value. However, this product offers unique features that make it worth more than the standard. I'm willing to come down slightly to $13,250.
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I'd like to offer $12,800 for the product. I think this is a fair price considering the value it will bring to me.
